name: P.E.R.M.A
description:
P.E.R.M.A

Planet Earth Revision Modern Age

 At the beginning , you start with a little asteroid and you must survive to became a planet. The game will have many levels. In the first one , you need to grow up with the help of the right materials to became a planet . After all of that , you need to keep her safe .

The message of this game is to understand what it means to be a planet and through how many stages and dangerous situations it has gone to reach what is today .
All we have our road , not just the humans . All we need to do is to try to look behind all of the layers and to understand them .

If you manage to reach next level then you are brilliant 

Have Fun

* C = change camera

* Left Click = Atract Astero

* Right Click = Shoot

* Escape = MainMenu

* Mouse Input = Rotate Planet + Look Around

* I = In Game HUD

*M =Minimap
